subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey beat Thiago Alves, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4, 7-6 (3), on Sunday in Jacksonville, Fla., to give the United States a 3-2 victory over Brazil and a spot in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Sam Querrey beat Thiago Alves, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4, 7-6 (3), on Sunday in Jacksonville, Fla., to give the United States a 3-2 victory over Brazil and a spot in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.
